name: Manish Batchu
desc: I build things for the web
briefdesc: I’m a software engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I’m focused on building accessible, human-centered products at Upstatement.

aboutmedesc: Hello! My name is Manish, and I'm a frontend developer that enjoys backend development and building code that requires logical issue solving.

While I enjoy creating smooth, user-friendly interfaces, I am most motivated by the difficulties of developing scalable, efficient backend solutions. I enjoy solving challenging coding issues and bridging the gap between the frontend and backend to develop unified, high-performance apps.

built.name: Haylop ushdhs
built.desc: A web app for visualizing personalized Spotify data. View your top artists, top tracks, recently played tracks, and detailed audio information about each track. Create and save new playlists of recommended tracks based on your existing playlists and more.

built.name: Haylon Theme
built.desc: A web app for visualizing personalized Spotify data. View your top artists, top tracks, recently played tracks, and detailed audio information about each track. Create and save new playlists of recommended tracks based on your existing playlists and more.

projects.name: Ecommerce website
projects.desc: Developed a e-commerce website using React, with state management handled via Context API and Redux. Integrated the FakeStore API for product data, implementing features like product listings and shopping cart functionality. This project enhanced my skills in building scalable React applications and managing dynamic state effectively.

projects.name: Clone of cricbuzz
projects.desc: Made a clone of cricbuzz where an admin creates a matches and the user can monitor scores on the application.
